languages.text: "Операция завершена. Незначимые фрагменты лобной доли, отвечающие за сохранение мотивации, удалены. Ожидается повышение уровня покорности единицы". {n}Голос техножреца не более эмоционален, чем визг его сверла.{/n}

"Procedure complete. Insignificant parts of the unit's frontal lobe responsible for motivation have been removed. I expect an increase in the unit's obedience levels." {n}Pasqal's voice conveys as much emotion as the sound of his drill.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Операция завершена. Незначимые фрагменты лобной доли, отвечающие за сохранение мотивации, удалены. Ожидается повышение уровня покорности единицы". {n}Голос техножреца не более эмоционален, чем визг его сверла.{/n}

"Procedure complete. Insignificant parts of the unit's frontal lobe responsible for motivation have been removed. I expect an increase in the unit's obedience levels." {n}Pasqal's voice conveys as much emotion as the sound of his drill.{/n}

languages.text: «Procedimiento completo. Se han eliminado las partes insignificantes del lóbulo frontal de la unidad que controlan la motivación. Espero un aumento en los niveles de obediencia de la unidad». {n}La voz de Pasqal transmite tanta emoción como el chirrido de su taladro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Procedure complete. Insignificant parts of the unit's frontal lobe responsible for motivation have been removed. I expect an increase in the unit's obedience levels." {n}Pasqal's voice conveys as much emotion as the sound of his drill.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Procedimiento completo. Se han eliminado las partes insignificantes del lóbulo frontal de la unidad que controlan la motivación. Espero un aumento en los niveles de obediencia de la unidad». {n}La voz de Pasqal transmite tanta emoción como el chirrido de su taladro.{/n}

languages.text: 「処置完了。やる気を司る前頭葉の重要な部分が取り除かれた。このユニットの服従レベルが上がることを期待している」{n}パスカルの声からは、彼のドリルの音と同じく、感情が伝わってくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Procedure complete. Insignificant parts of the unit's frontal lobe responsible for motivation have been removed. I expect an increase in the unit's obedience levels." {n}Pasqal's voice conveys as much emotion as the sound of his drill.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「処置完了。やる気を司る前頭葉の重要な部分が取り除かれた。このユニットの服従レベルが上がることを期待している」{n}パスカルの声からは、彼のドリルの音と同じく、感情が伝わってくる。{/n}

languages.text: “改造完成，切除了大脑额叶所有与动机相关的无关组织。我期望这个单位的服从程度能有所提高。”{n}帕斯卡声音中传达出的情感，和他的电钻发出的嗡嗡声没有太大区别。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Procedure complete. Insignificant parts of the unit's frontal lobe responsible for motivation have been removed. I expect an increase in the unit's obedience levels." {n}Pasqal's voice conveys as much emotion as the sound of his drill.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “改造完成，切除了大脑额叶所有与动机相关的无关组织。我期望这个单位的服从程度能有所提高。”{n}帕斯卡声音中传达出的情感，和他的电钻发出的嗡嗡声没有太大区别。{/n}

languages.text: "Verfahren abgeschlossen. Unbedeutende Teile des Frontallappens der Einheit, welche für die Motivation zuständig sind, wurden entfernt. Ich erwarte einen Anstieg der Gehorsamkeitswerte der Einheit." {n}Pasqals Stimme vermittelt so viel Emotion wie das Geräusch seines Bohrers.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Procedure complete. Insignificant parts of the unit's frontal lobe responsible for motivation have been removed. I expect an increase in the unit's obedience levels." {n}Pasqal's voice conveys as much emotion as the sound of his drill.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Verfahren abgeschlossen. Unbedeutende Teile des Frontallappens der Einheit, welche für die Motivation zuständig sind, wurden entfernt. Ich erwarte einen Anstieg der Gehorsamkeitswerte der Einheit." {n}Pasqals Stimme vermittelt so viel Emotion wie das Geräusch seines Bohrers.{/n}

languages.text: « Procédure terminée. Les parties superflues du lobe frontal responsables de la volition ont été supprimées. Résultat escompté : hausse importante du niveau d'obéissance du sujet. » {n}La voix de Pasqal exprime autant d'émotions que le vrombissement de sa perceuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Procedure complete. Insignificant parts of the unit's frontal lobe responsible for motivation have been removed. I expect an increase in the unit's obedience levels." {n}Pasqal's voice conveys as much emotion as the sound of his drill.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Procédure terminée. Les parties superflues du lobe frontal responsables de la volition ont été supprimées. Résultat escompté : hausse importante du niveau d'obéissance du sujet. » {n}La voix de Pasqal exprime autant d'émotions que le vrombissement de sa perceuse.{/n}

languages.text: "Operasyon tamamlandı. Birimin ön lobundaki, motivasyonun işleyişini sağlayan gereksiz kısımlar çıkarıldı. Birimin itaatkârlık seviyesinde artış gözlenmesini bekliyorum." {n}Pasqal'ın ses tonu, matkabının sesinden çok da fazla duygu taşımıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Procedure complete. Insignificant parts of the unit's frontal lobe responsible for motivation have been removed. I expect an increase in the unit's obedience levels." {n}Pasqal's voice conveys as much emotion as the sound of his drill.{/n}
